r.s: Provides functionality to dump the internal representation of PHP scripts
r.d: The Vulcan Logic Disassembler hooks into the Zend Engine and dumps all the opcodes (execution units) of a script.
r.n: This release adds a lot of Zend Engine 2 support, fixes some bugs and changes the way on how VLD is activated. Only if the configure setting "vld.active" is set to "1" it will dump the op arrays.
